text: 16|72|arau allahe tomalokara paraa'i tomalokara yoraa (sangini) srsti karaiche arau tomalokara sanginira paraa'i tomalokara babe santana arau natiputi srsti karaiche arau tomalokaka uttama jiranopakarana dana karaiche. Tathapi'o sihamte batilara sbikrti dibane arau allahara anugraha asbikara karaibane
